wikipedia_page.main: Emelia Jane Gorecka (born 29 January 1994), is a British middle- and long-distance runner, racing in the 1500 metres, 3000 metres, 5000 metres and 10,000 metres as well as cross country courses. She was the 3000m 2012 World Junior Championships bronze medalist and 2013 European Junior champion. Gorecka won also two individual European junior cross-country titles (2011, 2013).

response: In the under-23 races Pieter-Jan Hannes of Belgium won the men's race and Great Britain topped the team rankings.Hannes shows what he is made of. European Athletics (8 December 2013). Retrieved 16 December 2013. Sifan Hassan of the Netherlands was dominant in the women's under-23 race, where the British under-23 team easily won the team gold with five women in the top eight.Hassan's Dutch delight as Terzic brings joy to Serbia. European Athletics (8 December 2013). Retrieved 16 December 2013. The junior men's race saw Turkey's Ali Kaya come out on top in a two-man race against Belgium's Isaac Kimeli.Kaya's late speed takes him to gold in a thriller. European Athletics (8 December 2013). Retrieved 16 December 2013. Women's junior champion Emelia Gorecka won a fourth straight junior team title for Great Britain and also her fourth straight podium finish (she previously won the title in 2011). She was unrivalled and won by a margin of ten seconds.Gorecka strolls away to win gold again. European Athletics (8 December 2013). Retrieved 16 December 2013.
